Message Security Layer (MSL)

Uses of Package
com.netflix.msl.crypto

Packages that use com.netflix.msl.crypto
com.netflix.msl.entityauth Entity authentication. 
com.netflix.msl.keyx Key exchange. 
com.netflix.msl.msg Messaging classes, including the MSL stack interface MslControl. 
com.netflix.msl.tokens The master token, user ID token, service token, and related classes. 
com.netflix.msl.util Auxiliary classes including the application configuration MslContext and data store MslStore. 
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.crypto used by com.netflix.msl.entityauth
ICryptoContext
          A generic cryptographic context suitable for encryption/decryption, wrap/unwrap, and sign/verify operations.
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.crypto used by com.netflix.msl.keyx

          A generic cryptographic context suitable for encryption/decryption, wrap/unwrap, and sign/verify operations.
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.crypto used by com.netflix.msl.msg

          A generic cryptographic context suitable for encryption/decryption, wrap/unwrap, and sign/verify operations.
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.crypto used by com.netflix.msl.tokens
ICryptoContext
          A generic cryptographic context suitable for encryption/decryption, wrap/unwrap, and sign/verify operations.
 

Classes in com.netflix.msl.crypto used by com.netflix.msl.util
